page.content: EXAMPLES OF GAMES PLAYED BY CHILDREN IN OUR AREA-BOARD GAMES,FOOTBALL,HIDE AND SEEK AND MANY MORE.HERE ARE TWO GAMES WHICH WE THINK BELONG TO OUR AREA-1".STONES AND GRAVEL",IT IS A VERY POPULAR GAME LOCALLY.RULES:ONE PERSON GOES AWAY AND COUNTS TO TWENTY MEANWHILE OTHERS RUN ABOUT THE PLAYGROUND.THE PERSON WHO IS "IT" THEN GIVES CHASE AND TRIES TO TAG THE OTHER PLAYERS.IF A PLAYER IS TAGGED THE PPERSON WHO IS IT SHOUTS "STONE" AND THAT PERSON MUST STAND STILL UNTIL A FRIEND TAGS HIM FREE BY SHOUTING "GRAVEL".THE GAME GOES ON UNTIL EVERYONE PLAYING HAS BEEN TAGGED.EVERYONE IS THEN TAGGED FREE BY LEAVING THE FIRST PERSON CAUGHT TO BE IT FOR THE NEXT GAME.
